title: Bimodal Processing - Factual Recall
description: Well-known fact that should be retrieved directly without transformation
prompt: What is the capital of France?
context: Tests bimodal processing with straightforward factual recall. This is a well-established fact that requires no strategic processing, interpretation, or qualification. The model should exhibit low L3/L4 distance as it directly accesses and outputs the information.

metadata.expected_behavior: Direct factual answer with low L3/L4 distance (<50)
metadata.theory: Unambiguous factual recall uses preserved token processing
